Build a request for SIPRI data

Source: R/sipri_request.R
sipri_build_request.Rd

Constructs an HTTP request for the SIPRI data export.

Usage

sipri_build_request(verbose = FALSE)

Value

An httr2 request object configured with the specified parameters.
